name: Mythic Depths (Skill Card)
text:
Mako / Skill / Field Spell
[ACTIVATION]
At the start of the Duel, place this card in your Field Spell Zone and flip it over.

[EFFECT]
All Fish, Sea Serpent, Thunder, and Aqua monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF. 
All Machine and Pyro monsters on the field lose 200 ATK/DEF. 
This card's name becomes "Umi" while on the field.
